question: Indian Railways decided to run the Tejas express of which of the following route by IRCTC?
explanation: Indian Railways decided to run the Tejas express of the Mumbai-Ahmedabad route by IRCTC (Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation). The Delhi-Lucknow route will also be run by IRCTC. Tejas Express is India's first semi-high speed fully air-conditioned train which was Introduced by Indian Railways.
